General.Name: MH Robot & Automation Co. Ltd.
General.Description: MH Robot & Automation Co., Ltd. provides intelligent equipment systems, Internet of Things system, planning and design, and EPC services in China and internationally. The company offers intelligent welding equipment system comprising of robot system, positioning fixture, welding device, water and electricity supply device, control system, and other equipment; and intelligent coating equipment system primarily based on automobile intelligent equipment system, including pretreatment, electrophoresis, spraying, and drying system. It also provides intelligent conveying system, such as skid, plate chain, ground drag, friction, roller, single-track bicycle trolley, double-track bicycle trolley, skateboard, reverse monorail, and painting double chain conveying systems; intelligent environmental protection system, including intelligent VOCs waste gas treatment and sewage treatment equipment system; and utility power system, equipment energy supply system, and intelligent monitoring and management system. In addition, the company offers smart building, factory, energy, agriculture, and other management system based on robotics and Internet of Things technologies. Further, it offers industrial process planning and design, and architectural design services. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Weifang, China.
